English: I would like to invite you to dinner
Can you tell me more about you?
Oromo: Waa'ee kee kana caalaa natti himuu dandeessaa?

English: Can I have your phone number?
Oromo: Lakkoofsa bilbilaa keessan qabaachuu nan danda'aa?

English: Do you have any pictures of you?
My heart speaks the language of love

Amharic: በጣም ቅርብ የሆነው ፋርማሲ የት ነው?
Oromo: Manni qorichaa dhiyoo jiru eessa jira?

English: I have a reservation (for a room)

Amharic: ከመታጠቢያ ቤት ጋር / ከመታጠቢያ ቤት ጋር

English: I would like a non-smoking room
Oromo: Kutaa tamboo hin xuuxne nan barbaada

English: What is the charge per night?
Amharic: ለአንድ ሌሊት ክፍያ ምን ያህል ነው?
Tigrinya: ንሓንቲ ለይቲ ዝኽፈል ክፍሊት ክንደይ እዩ?

English: What's the name of this dish?
